title: vallarI samAnE mAdhava kara shAkE
sahitya:
vallarI samAnE mAdhava kara shAkE ArOhita muraLI gAna samAna lOlana


anupallavi

  vallavi kusumita brndAvana mAdhava mAruta gAna sudhArasa bhAvita mOhana lOlana kOmaLa


caraNam    pAda kaTaka nUpura maNi kiraNE padma daLa nikara kOmaLa caraNE pIta saurabha nava 
navAbharaNE vEda nigama sama nAda muraLIdhara mAdhava manasi vibOdha dyuti kanaka
